title: At RISD's 2025 Senior Runway Show, Students Took a 'Material-Driven' Design Approach
description: On Wednesday, the Rhode Island School of Design (RISD) presented its end-of-year senior fashion show, Collection 2025. The showcase featured the work of 12 senior design students:Â Anna Winters, Avidron, Ruolin Bai, Jersey Bond, Isabel Clulow, Nura Dhar, Olivia Rose Founier, Vivian "Bibi" Lin, ...Continue reading
author: Janelle Sessoms
